org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core

Class CqlTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springdata.cassandra.cql.core.CqlTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CqlOperations

    public class CqlTemplate
extends Object
implements CqlOperations
    This is the Central class in the Cassandra core package. It simplifies the use of Cassandra and helps to avoid common errors. It executes the core Cassandra workflow, leaving application code to provide CQL and result extraction. This class execute CQL Queries, provides different ways to extract/map results, and provides Exception translation to the generic, more informative exception hierarchy defined in the org.springframework.dao package.

    For working with POJOs, use the CassandraTemplate.

    Author:
    Alex Shvid, David Webb, Matthew Adams

      • process

        public void process(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
           RowCallbackHandler rch)
        Description copied from interface: CqlOperations
        Processes the ResultSet through the RowCallbackHandler and return nothing. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Specified by:
        process in interface CqlOperations
        Parameters:
        resultSet - Results to process
        rch - RowCallbackHandler with the processing implementation

      • process

        public <T> List<T> process(com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet resultSet,
                  RowMapper<T> rowMapper)
        Description copied from interface: CqlOperations
        Processes the ResultSet through the RowMapper and returns the List of mapped Rows. This is used internal to the Template for core operations, but is made available through Operations in the event you have a ResultSet to process. The ResultsSet could come from a ResultSetFuture after an asynchronous query.
        Specified by:
        process in interface CqlOperations
        Parameters:
        resultSet - Results to process
        rowMapper - RowMapper with the processing implementation
        Returns:
        List of generated by the RowMapper

      • execute

        public <T> T execute(com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement ps,
            PreparedStatementCallback<T> rsc)
        Description copied from interface: CqlOperations
        Executes the prepared statement and processes the statement using the provided Callback. This can only be used for CQL Statements that do not have data binding. The results of the PreparedStatement are processed with PreparedStatementCallback implementation provided by the Application Code.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface CqlOperations
        Parameters:
        ps - The implementation to create the PreparedStatement
        rsc - What to do with the results of the PreparedStatement
        Returns:
        Type as determined by the supplied Callback.

      • ingest

        public IngestOperation ingest(com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement ps,
                     Iterable<Object[]> rows)
        Description copied from interface: CqlOperations
        This is an operation designed for high performance writes. The cql is used to create a PreparedStatement once, then all row values are bound to the single PreparedStatement and executed against the Session.

        This is used internally by the other ingest() methods, but can be used if you want to write your own RowIterator. The Object[] length returned by the next() implementation must match the number of bind variables in the CQL.

        Specified by:
        ingest in interface CqlOperations
        Parameters:
        ps - The PreparedStatement
        rows - Implementation to provide the Object[] to be bound to the CQL.

      • ingest

        public IngestOperation ingest(com.datastax.driver.core.PreparedStatement ps,
                     Object[][] rows)
        Description copied from interface: CqlOperations
        This is an operation designed for high performance writes. The cql is used to create a PreparedStatement once, then all row values are bound to the single PreparedStatement and executed against the Session.

        The Object[] length of the nested array must match the number of bind variables in the CQL.

        Specified by:
        ingest in interface CqlOperations
        Parameters:
        ps - The PreparedStatement
        rows - Object array of Object array of values to bind to the CQL.
